data.message: Eminem has spoke his mind (that's what he does best).. told you all where his thoughts are at quite clearly by using his talent to get the message across.  You can either respect that and still listen to his raps or as he said.. you have a choice... 'f#ck you' aka 'f#ck off'.  Some even want to fight him😅... Think maybe someone has hit a nerve☝... stop crying abt it and move on with your life. Your giving me headache✌
